item.title: New Paradigms, New Challenges
item.description:
I want to take some time in this post to talk about some of the new challenges with my project rebuild, particular to building a Progressive Web App (PWA). As I said in my last post, the PWA paradigm is the reason I’m not using Next.js. But there are other challenges around the “offline first” mentality that I hadn’t considered until diving into things.

Here are the problems I’ve been wrestling with over the past few weeks:
